title: Apigee - Next steps
abstract:
# Apigee - Next steps
**    Preview    — Apigee API hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
This document lists some possible next steps to take based on your goals.
- Are you a, looking for APIs to use?See:- [   Discover APIs using APIs list](/apigee/docs/api-hub/apis-list) 
- Are you a, wanting to add APIs to API hub?See:- [APIs overview](/apigee/docs/api-hub/explore-overview) 
- [Register APIs](/apigee/docs/api-hub/register-apis) 
- [   Bulk import APIs using the registry tool](https://github.com/apigee/registry/tree/main/demos) 
- Are you an, setting the rules and standards?See:- [APIs overview](/apigee/docs/api-hub/explore-overview) 
- [Register APIs](/apigee/docs/api-hub/register-apis) 
- [Manage versions](/apigee/docs/api-hub/versions) 
- [Manage deployments](/apigee/docs/api-hub/deployments) 
- [Manage revisions](/apigee/docs/api-hub/revisions) 
- [Manage taxonomies](/apigee/docs/api-hub/taxonomies) 
- [Manage lifecycle stages](/apigee/docs/api-hub/lifecycle-stages) 
- [Declare dependencies](/apigee/docs/api-hub/dependencies) 
- [Customize the API hub display](/apigee/docs/api-hub/customize-display) 
- To access the API hub:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **API hub** page.
- [ Go to API hub](https://console.cloud.google.com/apigee/hub/apis) 
- The **APIs** list page is displayed by default. The first time you view  this page, there are no APIs listed. You must [Register](/apigee/docs/api-hub/register-apis) or [import](#import) any APIs that you want to manage using API hub.
